column1: Claw foot is a deformity of the foot.
Claw toes may be caused by a nerve problem in the legs or a spinal cord problem.
Claw toes may cause pain and lead to calluses on the top of the toe over the first joint, but may also be painless.
- Do you have any abnormal feelings in your feet?
The abnormal shape of the toe can increase pressure and cause calluses or ulcers on your toes.
